attributes.action: Take banks' CEOs to task and make them pay back bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst UK taxpayers are left to foot the bill for failing banks. Their CEOs are taking home millions of pounds in bonuses. Whilst some CEOs are feeling 'horrible' about it they are not being taken to task as they should and need to be made to pay their bonuses, which are obviously undeserved, back to taxpayers.
